[data-index='0'] .b-rownumber-cell.title: Row number selection
[data-index='0'] .b-rownumber-cell.content: Use the RowNumber column to select whole rows

[data-index='5'] [data-column='name'].title: Auto edit multiple cells
[data-index='5'] [data-column='name'].content: Select a range of cells by shift-clicking or drag-selecting. Then start typing and hit Ctrl/Cmd+Enter to edit a range of cells simultaneously.

[data-index='4'] [data-column='assignmen.title: Cell copy paste and the Fill handle feature
[data-index='4'] [data-column='assignmen.content: Select one or a range of cells, copy (Ctrl/Cmd+C) and paste (Ctrl/Cmd+V) somewhere else. Or use the fill handle icon in the bottom right corner to fill a new range with the selected value(s).
